attributes.action: not go ahead with abolishing the 10 pc income tax band
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 10 pc income tax band has helped give the poorer population of this country the ability to survive on low income. Removing this band and replacing it with a straight 20 pc basic band will make it harder for these people to afford to live. How can this be allowed when the poorer population are already suffering as it is with increased council tax, ever increasing heating costs and rent?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
